text: @RepMarkGreen @SpeakerPelosi @realDonaldTrump 🇨🇦You are in trouble but it has little to do with Nancy. Trump's lack of response has proved fatal. You should look north we have real federal leadership. In checking this morning the US death rate from the coronavirus is 2X Canada's
